item.name: Ham Sandwich
item.description: A ham, lettuce & tomato sandwich made with fresh wholemeal bread.

item.name: Vege Salad
item.description: Carrot, broccoli, brussel sprouts, zucchini & bell pepper salad served with couscous.

item.name: Fish & Chips
item.description: Fish & chips served with tartare sauce and a cucumber, lettuce, tomato & onion salad.

item.name: Beef Burger
item.description: Beef & bacon burger with lettuce, tomato, cheese & mayo.

item.name: Chicken Salad
item.description: Fried chicken and baked potato wedges served with a cucumber, tomato & red onion salad.
